response.original_title: 田中と呪物と怪談と　第６回　前編
response.overview: In the first part, he first introduced [Grandma's Death Mask], which came from a historical dentist's house in Kyoto. After hearing the story of this death mask, which had been in Tanaka's possession for some time, Yassou recalled a ghost story about his "grandmother's belongings".... The next item introduced was the "Monkey Hand," a Thai curse that, when held, has the effect of depriving others of their benefits.
response.title: Tanaka to Jumonmono to Kaidan to Dai 6-kai Zenpen
